name: Echo Dot (5th Gen)
product_description: Our most popular smart speaker with Alexa. Improved audio quality delivers clearer vocals, deeper bass, and vibrant sound in any room. Voice control your entertainment, smart home devices, and more.
description: Smart speaker with Alexa voice assistant. Perfect for tech lovers, smart home enthusiasts, and anyone who enjoys music, podcasts, or hands-free convenience. Great for people who like to stay organized with reminders and timers.

name: LEGO Star Wars Millennium Falcon
product_description: Kids can role-play as their favorite characters from the Star Wars saga with this LEGO Millennium Falcon construction toy. Features rotating gun turrets, 2 spring-loaded shooters, a lowering ramp, and an opening cockpit.
description: Iconic Star Wars spaceship building set. Perfect for Star Wars fans, LEGO enthusiasts, and anyone who enjoys hands-on building projects. Great for collectors and those who love detailed model sets.
